name: LD50 - Aeldun 20.000
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 50 not Jam, but Extra.

Aeldun 20.000 is a "grand" strategy game. You the ruler of the lands have to defend your territories from invasions from demonic portals. In order to prevent the inevitable defeat, you have to fund & complete your Victory Project, before the forces of evil overrun your territories.

The zip and the exe are the same version of the game
